channel.title: Growth Hack on Insights Hub - by Vijay Palyam
channel.description: Recent content in Growth Hack on Insights Hub - by Vijay Palyam

item.title: what is NSM? why is it important?
item.description: Most people define North Star metric as the single most important driver of success and it provides an initiative for the whole company to rally behind. Though this is a good definition, it does not explain what it reflects and what it leads to. North Star should reflect the customer value proposition and the long-term vision of the product. It should also lead to revenue, it should lead to measuring progress, and influence behavior of the entire organization.
